summary:
AdvisorShares Focused Equity ETF - Five Star Equity Investing
A concentrated, long-term portfolio with low-turnover and a long-term stock picking track record

 AdvisorShares Pure US Cannabis ETF - The Freedom to Invest in
U.S. Cannabis The United States represents the largest market in the world and still with the greatest untapped growth potential for cannabis.

 AdvisorShares Insiders Advantage ETF - “Insiders might sell their shares for any number of reasons, but they buy them for only one: they think the price will rise.” — Peter Lynch

 AdvisorShares Psychedelics ETF - Doors Are Opening to Psychedelics…
…as they display therapeutic benefits for treating a variety of conditions. PSIL is at the forefront of investing in this emerging sector.

 AdvisorShares Pure Cannabis ETF - Be Picky!
With cannabis exposure, active stock selection matters

 AdvisorShares Restaurant ETF - Put Your Money Where Your Mouth Is
The only ETF investing exclusively in the restaurant and food service industry.

 AdvisorShares Hotel ETF - We’ve Reserved Space Just for You
The only actively managed ETF investing exclusively in the global hotel industry and and travel-related services.

 AdvisorShares Vice ETF - “It has been my experience that folks who have no vices have very few virtues.” — Abraham Lincoln
